subject: On-line generic store
body:
Dear valued member.
Do you want to save on the most essential goods without having to purchase a product of lower quality that the one you're used to? Then Canadian product is what you need.
Don't be afraid of the word "Canadian" - the product offered is produced at branch plants of Pfizer, Johnson & Johnson and other major USA manufacturers which already means that the quality of the product is unimpeachable.
Hurry up to get hold of our Spring Specials - 20% discounts won't wait for too long.http://knewpush.hk
-------------------------------------------
Sincerely yours,Abdul Epps
